DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect food timing pharmacokinetics ( PK ) AZD0585 effect food time tolerability safety AZD0585 healthy male Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Effect Food Pharmacokinetics Total EPA Total DHA AZD0585 Healthy Male Japanese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , randomize , cross-over design three single-dose treatment period washout least 10 day treatment visit . The study period consist 5 visit study centre : Visit 1 ( enrolment ) , Visit 2 ( first single-dose treatment ) , Visit 3 ( second single-dose treatment ) , Visit 4 ( third single-dose treatment ) Visit 5 ( follow-up ) . Target subject population healthy male Japanese subject age 20-45 year . Following overnight fast least 10 hour , single dose 4 g AZD0585 administer 3 separate occasion ( fast , meal , meal ) randomize crossover fashion different food restriction .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male , 20 45 year age ( inclusive ) . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.5 ≤ 25 ( kg/m2 ) . Medically healthy clinically insignificant screen result ( e.g. , laboratory profile , medical history , ECGs , physical finding ) . Hemoglobin level must ≥ low limit study centre reference range . 12Lead ECG QT interval correct heart rate use Fridericia 's formula ( QTcF ) > 340 msec < 450 msec . No habitual use drug ( ) tobacco/nicotinecontaining product minimum 3 month prior first dose . Subjects must willing able give write informed consent sign Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve Informed Consent Form prior admission study follow restriction procedure outline study . Past history psychological physical disorder may affect objective study , opinion PI . An individual abnormal laboratory value ( ie , suggest hepatic , renal , cardiovascular endocrine disorder diabetes mellitus ) , inappropriate current past medical history participation base decision PI . A history presence significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , haematologic , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , neurologic psychiatric disease . Had use fish oil , EPA and/or DHAcontaining supplement within 2 month prior first admission day . Have serum ( plasma ) EPA and/or DHA concentration exceed upper limit reference range `` fatty acid profile , fourfraction '' test , determine Visit 1 .
